alert.note: Alert for Coastal Pender; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pender County through 745 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Point Caswell, or 13 miles southwest of Burgaw, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Surf City, Topsail Beach, White Stocking, Point Caswell, Long Creek, Montague, Rooks, Malpass Corner, Ashton, Rocky Point, Topsail, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, Woodside, Edgecomb, St. Helena, Atkinson and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 398 and 412. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
